Posts.Content: So if my PSA is .07 now, would these two digits have to climb to .99 and then .1 to be considered recurrent? Met with 2 oncologists, one said wait for more tests to establish a clear trend, the other to fire up the nukes now. Another person told me that the increased PSA is from benign prostrate tissue left behind on nerve endings? With the old exam I would still be considered undetected.
Posts.Signature: DOB 1946 surgery Nov 2014 PSA was 5.6 PSA after surgery was .08 Negative Margins, Negative Lymph All scans negative Tumor - 5 percent March and July 2015 PSA was <.05 Jan 2016 .07 Gleason 3+4

Jim, does Medicare pay full amount?

Posts.Content: I don't believe that we make it a big deal but in reality its really no big deal. People miss a few days at work for PC all the time. Colin Powell once left his position to have PC surgery. I am a teacher and told my students and colleagues.
Posts.Signature: DOB 1946 surgery Nov 2014 PSA was 5.6 PSA after surgery was .08 Negative Margins, Negative Lymph All scans negative Tumor - 5 percent March and July 2015 PSA was <.05 Jan 2016 .07 Gleason 3+4
